articles.title: Champions League final picks, predictions as Real Madrid face Dortmund: Jude Bellingham, Vini Jr. win it all - CBS Sports
articles.description: Saturday will decide who is crowned champion of Europe as the heavy favorites look to avoid slipping up against Dortmund
articles.content:
Borussia Dortmund and Real Madrid play for the title at Wembley Stadium Saturday.
Real Madrid are the favorites to win a record 15th European title in London, and head to the British capital after a… [+3550 chars]
